mapper.select: select a.*,rownum from (select * from CommunityTopic order by updatetime desc) a where rownum < 7

select ct.*,cf.name forumName,cu.nickname authorName,cu.user_hp_path,cu.signature,cu.grade from CommunityTopic ct join CommunityForum cf on cf.id = ct.forumid join CommunityUser cu on cu.id = ct.authorid where ct.id = ${id}
